title: Calories in 2 Tablespoons Butter
meta_description: Discover calories in 2 tablespoons butter, including full nutrition breakdown, fat content, and simple tweaks for variations under 160 characters.
assumptions: Regular unsalted butter, 1 tbsp â‰ˆ14 g, solid form, no additives.

quick_answer.text: 2 tablespoons of butter provide ~204 kcal, mostly from fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one tablespoon of butter?
faqs.a: About 102 kcal per tablespoon of regular butter.

faqs.q: Is butter high in saturated fat?
faqs.a: Yes, 2 tablespoons have ~14.6 g saturated fat.

faqs.q: Calories in 2 tablespoons butter vs. oil?
faqs.a: Similar to olive oil (~240 kcal for 2 tbsp), but butter has more saturated fat.

faqs.q: Does unsalted butter have less sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, only ~4 mg sodium in 2 tbsp vs. 182 mg in salted.

faqs.q: How much cholesterol in 2 tablespoons butter?
